_header: Now begins to go the banner of our Lord the King
Subjects: translations; hymns, to Christ; Christ, hymns to
_description: Four lines translating the first stanza of the hymn, Vexilla regis prodeunt

BodLatTheD1.Transcription:
Now begynnys to go þe banner of our lord þe kyngnow kun
                    spryng wide þe crose tokenyngGod þat made man and eueri
                    thyngis hongid on þe rode tre for our giltis and synnyng
